CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AquaFlow Utilities relative to Meridian Gas & Electric?
SRP.A: AquaFlow Utilities is {below} Meridian Gas & Electric in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Renewables relative to Zephyr Waste Solutions?
SRP.A: Borealis Renewables is {below} Zephyr Waste Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Grid Solutions relative to Meridian Gas & Electric?
SRP.A: Stellar Grid Solutions is {below} Meridian Gas & Electric in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total carbon emissions?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {AquaFlow Utilities}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total carbon emissions?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Solara Energy Corp}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Grid Solutions's minimum Carbon Emissions in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Grid Solutions's minimum Carbon Emissions is in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Renewables's maximum Carbon Emissions in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Renewables's maximum Carbon Emissions is in {2003}.

NC.Q: Was the total Carbon Emissions in 1987 higher or lower than in 2003?
NC.A: The total carbon emissions in 1987 was {lower} than in 2003.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 1998, was the average total Carbon Emissions higher or lower than between 1988 and 1998?
NC.A: The average total carbon emissions between 1997 and 1998 was {higher} than between 1988 and 1998.

NC.Q: Was the total Carbon Emissions in 1990 higher or lower than in 1994?
NC.A: The total carbon emissions in 1990 was {higher} than in 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Carbon Emissions in 1991 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total carbon emissions in 1991 was {lower} than in 2000.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {AquaFlow Utilities} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Solara Energy Corp and AquaFlow Utilities first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Solara Energy Corp and AquaFlow Utilities first exchanged leading positions in {1988}.
